marilla Package¶

defMenus Module¶

Ensembles des def lance depuis le menu mopa>guerilla Peuvent etre utilise hors menu.

marilla.defMenus.add_custom_tags(*args)¶

add and remove custom tags on selection with GUI

marilla.defMenus.api_help(*args)¶

open firefox for display marilla’s api help

marilla.defMenus.auto_tags_selection(*args)¶

auto tag all selected objects

marilla.defMenus.create_geurilla_submenu(menu)¶

create all submenu guerilla

marilla.defMenus.export_selection(*args)¶

collect all export options for abc and send to guerilla with GUI

marilla.defMenus.remove_all_tags(*args)¶

remove all tags selected objects

guegueTags Module¶

class marilla.guegueTags.GuegueTags(obj, grp=0)¶

Bases: object

wrapper de tags pour guerilla wrapper qui genere les tags de base: transform name, top parent name. et possede une serie de methodes permettant d’ajouter ou supprimer des tags guerilla.

Parameters:
  • obj (transform) – object de type transform ou camera ou mesh
  • grp (int) – level of depth parents to tags
VALIDE_OBJ = ['camera', 'mesh']¶
add_to_tags(tag=None)¶

add extra tag to tags list

Parameters:tag (string) – extra tag to add must be str
remove_to_tags(tag=None)¶

remove extra tag to tags list

Parameters:tag (string) – tag name to remove
write_tags()¶

write tags in extr attributes object

maUtils Module¶

marilla.maUtils.abc_export(framemode='currentframe', qstart=0, qend=0, preroll=False, path='', preframe=0, nodes=[])¶

wrapper the abcexport export abc file with abcexport maya command with some preset like uvwrite, world space, color groups, face groups

Parameters:
  • framemode (string) – currentframe, timeslider, startend
  • qstart (int) – precise start frame manualy for startend framemode option
  • qend (int) – precise end frame manualy for startend framemode option
  • preroll (bool) – active a preroll compute frames
  • preframe (int) – precise the preroll start frame
  • nodes (list) – list of maya transform nodes
  • path (string) – the alembic path file

marillaUi Module¶

marilla.marillaUi.ui_add_custom_tags(exec_add_button, exec_remove_button)¶

create ui window for add and remove guerilla tags

marilla.marillaUi.ui_export_selection(exec_button)¶

create ui window for export to abc and guerilla

mopaMenu Module¶

Create a mopa menu, if it already exists it is delete and recreate from scratch.

marilla.mopaMenu.create_mopa()¶

create menu mopa, delete it if already exists

marilla.mopaMenu.get_main_window_name()¶

return the main maya window
